translation.en: -[woman] What are you eating? -[girl] Guess.
translation.zh: 你在吃什么？

translation.en: -[woman] I can't guess. -[girl in sing-song] Bet you can.
translation.zh: -你猜-我猜不到 -你肯定能猜到-我怎么猜得到？

translation.en: -[woman] How can I guess? -[girl] What day is it today?
translation.zh: -你肯定能猜到-我怎么猜得到？ -今天是星期几？-星期一

translation.en: [woman] Uh, it's Monday.
translation.zh: -今天是星期几？-星期一

translation.en: Oh. Sunday night's pizza night. -You're eating leftover pizza. -[girl giggles]
translation.zh: 星期天晚上吃披萨所以你在吃昨晚剩下的

translation.en: Hey, make Dad go pick you out a pumpkin. It's that time of year again.
translation.zh: 嘿 让爸爸给你挑个南瓜 又到万圣节了整个街区都摆了南瓜装饰

translation.en: -They're all over. -[buzzer rings]
translation.zh: 又到万圣节了整个街区都摆了南瓜装饰

translation.en: -[girl] Okay. -[woman] All right.
translation.zh: -好的-好了

translation.en: -Let me talk to Daddy. -[boy on intercom] Delivery.
translation.zh: -叫爸爸来接电话 宝贝儿-快递到了 ！

translation.en: -[girl] Daddy! -[buzzing] Daddy!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: -[man] Hey, Slugger. -[woman] Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 亲爱的-嘿

translation.en: [man] Tell me something good. -[woman] Something good.
translation.zh: 说点开心的事 开心的事

translation.en: -[woman] You were right about 101. -[man] How's that?
translation.zh: -关于101号的情况 你说对了-怎么说？

translation.en: [woman] But who moves in after a one-day paint job? [man] Well, you said it was in good shape.
translation.zh: -谁会搬进一天就刷好了的房子啊？-你说那房子的情况还不错啊

translation.en: [woman] I wish you were here.
translation.zh: 真希望你在这里

translation.en: -[man] Who does that help, saying that? -[woman] I can beat myself up if I want.
translation.zh: -你这样说有什么用？-只要我想 我可以臭骂自己一顿

translation.en: [man] Go for it. It's just an audience of one.
translation.zh: 你骂啊 反正只有一个人围观 我不参与

translation.en: I'm not playing.
translation.zh: 反正只有一个人围观 我不参与

translation.en: [woman] Tell me to go outside.
translation.zh: 你快催我出门

translation.en: [man] Why not make today the day you go outside?
translation.zh: 今天就是你走出大门的日子 好吗？

translation.en: So, what's the latest on the street?
translation.zh: 街上最近有什么新鲜事？

translation.en: What happened with the barking dog?
translation.zh: 那只经常狂吠的狗怎么样了？

translation.en: I thought we were going to talk about medications.
translation.zh: 我以为咱们该说下用药的事了

translation.en: We'll get there.
translation.zh: 会说到的

translation.en: Would you like to take a seat?
translation.zh: 你要不要坐下？

translation.en: Did it get squared away? The dog?
translation.zh: -有人把它解决了吗？-你说狗吗？

translation.en: I guess they started bringing him inside.
translation.zh: 我猜那家人开始让狗进屋了

translation.en: Did you end up calling 311? [chuckles] Oh, David talked me out of it.
translation.zh: -后来你有没有打311？-戴维劝我别打了

translation.en: It's more of a bother for him anyway. It's louder downstairs.
translation.zh: 反正对他的影响更大住楼下觉得更吵

translation.en: So, I… must have talked to somebody.
translation.zh: 所以他应该是和什么人说过了

translation.en: Peaceful resolution.
translation.zh: 和平解决

translation.en: This is the second session that you've done this.
translation.zh: 这已经是你第二次这样做了

translation.en: Ask about the neighborhood?
translation.zh: 询问街坊邻里的事吗？

translation.en: Does that make you uncomfortable?
translation.zh: 问这些让你觉得不自在吗？

translation.en: I just don't know what you're goin' for.
translation.zh: 我只是不明白聊这些有什么用

translation.en: How's the prayer group?
translation.zh: 祷告的那家人呢？

translation.en: [woman sighs] They're getting by.
translation.zh: 他们凑合着过吧

translation.en: [man] Do you think they know you're watching?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们知道你在观察吗？

translation.en: Is this really what you wanna talk about?
translation.zh: 你真的想聊这些琐事吗？

translation.en: What about 101?
translation.zh: 101号一家呢？

translation.en: Looks like they already moved in.
translation.zh: 他们好像已经搬进去了

translation.en: What'd they pay?
translation.zh: 他们花了多少钱？

translation.en: Five-five. They were asking for six.
translation.zh: 550万 本来要价600万的

translation.en: Who are they? The Russells.
translation.zh: -那家人是谁？-拉塞尔一家

translation.en: Alistair and Jane. The broker says they're from Boston.
translation.zh: 丈夫叫阿利斯泰尔 妻子叫简房屋中介说他们从波士顿来的

translation.en: Where's the money from?
translation.zh: 他们家的钱哪来的？

translation.en: She says he's a banker.
translation.zh: 据说男主人是个银行家

translation.en: But there's practically nothing about them online.
translation.zh: 但是网上几乎查不到他们的任何信息

translation.en: I'm sure you'll figure it out.
translation.zh: 你肯定有办法查到的

translation.en: What the fuck, Karl?
translation.zh: 你到底想干什么 卡尔？

translation.en: Curiosity is evidence of a decreased depression pattern.
translation.zh: 有好奇心说明抑郁程度降低

translation.en: People who snoop on their neighbors don't kill themselves? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 所以窥探邻居的人不会自杀？

translation.en: Let's try this.
translation.zh: 这么说吧

translation.en: People who attempt suicide lose the right to joke about it.
translation.zh: 自杀未遂的人没有资格拿这个开玩笑

translation.en: I have a review with Dr. Kenner this week.
translation.zh: 这周我要和肯纳医生讨论一下

translation.en: Seeing as I've been unable to get you out the front door for the last 10 months,
translation.zh: 鉴于已经十个月了 我还是无法 让你走出大门

translation.en: she's gonna wonder about the source of my optimism.
translation.zh: 她肯定想知道我凭什么还如此乐观

translation.en: Let's talk about the Elevan.
translation.zh: 咱们说说你在吃的药

translation.en: Now that you've curtailed the drinking,
translation.zh: 既然你已经限制了饮酒

translation.en: how are you feeling about the side effects?
translation.zh: 药物副作用的感受如何？

translation.en: [man] I think you're reading into it.
translation.zh: 我觉得是你想多了

translation.en: [woman] I've been a shrink for 15 years. I know a threat when I hear one.
translation.zh: 我从事心理咨询15年了一听就知道是威胁

translation.en: [man] He's on your side, Slugger. He's the reason you're still here.
translation.zh: 他是为了帮你 亲爱的因为有他 你才还活着

translation.en: [woman] It's not really therapy if there's a knife at your back.
translation.zh: 如果我感觉有把刀抵在背后这就不算是治疗

translation.en: [man] He comes every week, rain or shine. He's been there all the way through.
translation.zh: 他每周都来 不论晴雨 他一直陪着你

translation.en: [woman] No, he's getting off on controlling me.
translation.zh: 不 他很享受对我的控制

translation.en: -[man] Really? -[woman] Yes. Did you read about Elevan?
translation.zh: -真的吗？-真的 你看过药物的说明吗？仔细看下副作用说明

translation.en: Take a look at the side effects.
translation.zh: 你看过药物的说明吗？仔细看下副作用说明

translation.en: [man] I know you're not supposed to drink on it.
translation.zh: 我知道在用药期间 你不应该喝酒

translation.en: [woman chuckles] They always say that.
translation.zh: 药物说明都这样说

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: [boy over speaker] I live, um, across the street there.
translation.zh: 我住在街对面

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: My mom asked me to give you this.
translation.zh: 我妈妈让我把这个送来

translation.en: I'm sorry…
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: I'm not prepared for visitors.
translation.zh: 我现在不方便待客

translation.en: [boy] Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Do you have any ideas about what I should do with this?
translation.zh: 能告诉我这东西应该怎么办吗？

translation.en: You can just…
translation.zh: 你可以…

translation.en: Push the door.
translation.zh: 推门进来

translation.en: Hi. I'm Ethan. Yes.
translation.zh: -你好 我叫伊森-好

translation.en: Hi. Anna.
translation.zh: 你好 我是安娜

translation.en: I'm from… across the street.
translation.zh: 我家就在街对面

translation.en: [Anna] Yes.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Sorry, I know you're not having, uh, visitors.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我知道你不便待客

translation.en: No, I'm… fine. You just surprised me, that's all.
translation.zh: 没事 我只是有些意外 没别的

translation.en: I'm not really a visitor so much.
translation.zh: 其实我也不算是访客

translation.en: I'm kind of, uh, more like a neighbor.
translation.zh: 应该说我是邻居

translation.en: -I love lavender. -Heh.
translation.zh: 我喜欢薰衣草味儿

translation.en: My mom asked me to give it to you, like… days ago.
translation.zh: 我妈几天前就让我把这个送来

translation.en: I think that I'm the one supposed to be giving you a gift, eh…
translation.zh: 其实应该是我去给你们送个礼物

translation.en: Welcome to the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 欢迎你们入住这个街区

translation.en: I like cats' tongues.
translation.zh: 我喜欢猫的舌头

translation.en: Sorry they're not fish fingers, buddy. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 抱歉 猫咪 这不是小鱼干

translation.en: He likes you.
translation.zh: 它挺喜欢你

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 哪有

translation.en: How do you like your new house?
translation.zh: 你觉得新家怎么样？

translation.en: I miss the old one.
translation.zh: 我想念以前的家

translation.en: But we had to leave Boston.
translation.zh: 但是我们不得不离开波士顿

translation.en: Are those your… people?
translation.zh: 这些是你的亲友吗？

translation.en: Family? Yes.
translation.zh: 家人？是的

translation.en: Are they home?
translation.zh: 他们在家吗？

translation.en: No, they don't live here. We're separated.
translation.zh: 不 他们不住这里 我们分居了

translation.en: How old is she?
translation.zh: 她多大了？

translation.en: She's eight.
translation.zh: 八岁

translation.en: How old are you?
translation.zh: 你多大了？

translation.en: I'm gonna be 16 in six months.
translation.zh: 再过六个月 我就16岁了

translation.en: Five months.
translation.zh: 其实是五个月

translation.en: What do you do?
translation.zh: 你是做什么的？

translation.en: Oh, I'm a psychologist. I work with kids.
translation.zh: 我是心理医生 跟孩子打交道

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Really.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: -That's interesting. -Why is that interesting?
translation.zh: -真有意思-为什么觉得有意思？

translation.en: I mean, it's more interesting than, like, working at Taco Bell.
translation.zh: 这比在塔可钟快餐店工作有意思

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Why would kids need a psychologist?
translation.zh: 小孩子为什么需要看心理医生？

translation.en: You really don't know why a kid would need a psychologist?
translation.zh: 你真的以为小孩子不需要看心理医生？

translation.en: No, I mean, I'm sure they do, but I mean, like, why?
translation.zh: 不是的 我知道他们需要只是不知道为什么

translation.en: Like, why do the kids who see you need a psychologist?
translation.zh: 那些来找你的孩子为什么需要心理咨询？

translation.en: -All sorts of reasons. -School shootings or torturing someone?
translation.zh: 各种各样的原因 比如遭遇校园枪击或者虐待他人？

translation.en: No, it doesn't have to be that dramatic. Some of them are depressed,
translation.zh: 比如遭遇校园枪击或者虐待他人？ 不一定是那么严重的事情 他们有些觉得很压抑有些陷入焦虑情绪

translation.en: some suffer from anxiety…
translation.zh: 他们有些觉得很压抑有些陷入焦虑情绪

translation.en: some of them are… just having a hard time adjusting to a new place.
translation.zh: 有些只是不适应新的生活环境

translation.en: I can see your house from my room.
translation.zh: 我可以从我的房间里看到你家

translation.en: I mean… normally.
translation.zh: 我是说 正常情况下

translation.en: Right now, I can see… my dad from your house.
translation.zh: 现在我可以从你家看到我爸爸

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: [Ethan] Yeah.
translation.zh: 还好

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: No, nothing, I just…
translation.zh: 没事 我只是…

translation.en: [softly] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: You can talk to me.
translation.zh: 你可以和我聊一聊

translation.en: I don't know anyone here.
translation.zh: 在这里 我谁也不认识

translation.en: You know me.
translation.zh: 你认识我啊

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 不算吧

translation.en: Well, you could. Really?
translation.zh: -那你可以认识一下-真的吗？

translation.en: We-we can be friends?
translation.zh: 我们能做朋友吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: Wow. You have a lot of movies.
translation.zh: 哇 你家有好多电影

translation.en: Too many. That's what my husband says.
translation.zh: 太多了 我丈夫总这样说

translation.en: I thought you said you guys were separated.
translation.zh: 你们不是已经分居了吗？

translation.en: He's still my husband, but you're right.
translation.zh: 但他还是我丈夫 不过你说得对

translation.en: You're welcome to borrow anything.
translation.zh: 这些影碟 你可以随便借

translation.en: Uh… My dad's kind of a tyrant with the TV.
translation.zh: 我爸总是一个人霸占电视

translation.en: -Goodbye, Punch. -[purrs]
translation.zh: 再见 小拳头

translation.en: I'm sorry I'm so allergic to you.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我对你过敏

translation.en: Why didn't you say something?
translation.zh: 你刚才怎么不说？

translation.en: I don't wanna offend him.
translation.zh: 我不想惹它不高兴

translation.en: He's not that sensitive.
translation.zh: 它没那么敏感

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay, then.
translation.zh: -那就这样了-观影愉快

translation.en: -Enjoy. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -那就这样了-观影愉快 谢谢你

translation.en: See you around? Yeah, see you around.
translation.zh: -回头见-好 再见

translation.en: …in some incredibly rustic community where good manners are unknown…
translation.zh: …在某个不知礼仪为何物的乡下社区…

translation.en: [man and Anna] …or you suffer from the common feminine delusion
translation.zh: 否则你就要忍受世人对女性的谬见

translation.en: that the mere fact of being a woman
translation.zh: 仅仅因为你是个女人

translation.en: exempts you from the rules of civilized conduct.
translation.zh: 仅仅因为你是个女人 就可以不受文明行为规范的约束

translation.en: [Anna] Conduct.
translation.zh: 行为

translation.en: -[man and Anna] Possibly both. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 也许两者都有

translation.en: [woman on TV] Possibly. But here's what I wanted to show you…
translation.zh: 也许吧 但我想让你看到的是…

translation.en: -[buzzer ringing] -[kids chattering outside]
translation.zh: （星期二）

translation.en: [man] I'm headed to Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 我要去一趟布鲁克林

translation.en: -You need me to take care of anything? -Right. Uh, no. Thanks, I'm good.
translation.zh: -有事需要我代办吗？-好的 我没什么事 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Sure? Take out the garbage?
translation.zh: 真的？要帮你扔垃圾吗？

translation.en: -Okay. As long as you're here. -[man] Okay.
translation.zh: -好吧 请你顺手扔一下-好的

translation.en: You know, David, you've been my tenant for three months.
translation.zh: 戴维 你已经住进来三个月了

translation.en: You don't have to be so formal.
translation.zh: 不用这么客气了

translation.en: You can just come in through the basement stairs.
translation.zh: 直接从地下室的楼梯上来就好

translation.en: -No, I don't wanna startle ya. -[bottles clinking]
translation.zh: 没事 我不想吓到你

translation.en: It's dark in here. Do the bulbs need changing?
translation.zh: 这儿太暗了 需要换灯泡吗？

translation.en: -I like it dim. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我喜欢昏暗一点-好吧

translation.en: Oh, Halloween tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚是万圣节

translation.en: How do we do it without you going outside?
translation.zh: 你不出门 怎么过万圣节？

translation.en: You want me to get some candy?
translation.zh: 要我帮你买点糖果吗？

translation.en: I'm not going to give out candy.
translation.zh: 我不打算发糖果

translation.en: I'm going to turn the lights out and pretend I'm not home.
translation.zh: 到时候我就把灯一关 假装没人在家

translation.en: We could just get a bowl of candy and leave it on the porch, like…
translation.zh: 其实我可以给你弄一碗糖果 放在门廊上 就可以…

translation.en: Any kid would take it within a minute and then they'd take the bowl.
translation.zh: 孩子们会瞬间抢光 连碗都抱走

translation.en: Why don't we get a bowl of apples? 'Cause kids won't take apples.
translation.zh: 那我们放一盆子苹果呢？因为小孩子不会吃苹果的

translation.en: Then what's the point?
translation.zh: 那这样做还有什么意义？

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh: 也对 好吧

translation.en: Have a nice time.
translation.zh: 祝你玩得愉快

translation.en: Sure. Happy Halloween.
translation.zh: 好 万圣节快乐

translation.en: [woman on TV] Let your mind go back to your childhood.
translation.zh: 让你的思绪回到童年时期

translation.en: -Was it happy? -[buzzer rings] -Whom did you know in your childhood? -[buzzer rings]
translation.zh: 感觉幸福吗？你在童年时期都认识了谁？

translation.en: -I can't see by what. -[thud]
translation.zh: 我不明白是什么困扰我

translation.en: -[gasps] -It's no use.
translation.zh: 这没用

translation.en: [woman] You lived somewhere. -You had a mother. -[thud] You were loved, you had friends.
translation.zh: 回忆你住的地方 那时你母亲还在有人爱你 你有朋友

translation.en: [man] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Get away from my house!
translation.zh: 离我家远点！

translation.en: -[kid] Right there! -Hey! -[kid] Get her! -[gasps]
translation.zh: -她在那儿！冲她扔！-嘿！

translation.en: -This is my house. -[kid] Get her!
translation.zh: -这是我家！-冲她扔！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: You're gonna have to convince me I don't need to call an ambulance.
translation.zh: 你必须得说服我 让我不叫救护车

translation.en: [Anna] No, don't do that.
translation.zh: 不 不用叫了

translation.en: Okay, you know who you are? You know what day it is?
translation.zh: 你知道自己是谁吗？今天是什么日子？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm Anna. It's Halloween.
translation.zh: 知道 我是安娜 今天是万圣节

translation.en: Okay, how many fingers?
translation.zh: 好 这里有几根手指？

translation.en: [Anna] Three.
translation.zh: -三根-行

translation.en: Okay. You're all right. You're gonna be all right. Just…
translation.zh: 你确实没事 你会好起来的

translation.en: breathing would be good.
translation.zh: 深呼吸有好处

translation.en: I was headed across the street
translation.zh: 我正准备过马路

translation.en: when those little shits started chucking eggs,
translation.zh: 看到那群熊孩子在扔鸡蛋

translation.en: and, oof, you went down hard.
translation.zh: 然后你一头栽倒了

translation.en: You're Jane Russell.
translation.zh: 你是简拉塞尔吧？

translation.en: What makes you say that?
translation.zh: 你为什么觉得我是？

translation.en: [Anna] Your… your son came by. Ethan.
translation.zh: 你儿子伊森来过

translation.en: [Jane] Sit up in case you got a concussion.
translation.zh: 嘿 坐起来 好吗？以防你有脑震荡

translation.en: -[faucet runs] -[Jane] Jesus, it's dark in here. Do you faint a lot?
translation.zh: 天啊 这里也太暗了你经常昏厥吗？

translation.en: I didn't faint.
translation.zh: 我没有昏厥

translation.en: I mean, it's… like fainting.
translation.zh: 我是说 看起来像昏厥

translation.en: -[Jane pours drink] -I can't go outside.
translation.zh: 我不能出门

translation.en: Um… you didn't go outside.
translation.zh: 你没有出去啊

translation.en: -No, I get panic attacks. -Who doesn't?
translation.zh: 不是 我有时会很恐慌

translation.en: Here. Have some of this brandy, please.
translation.zh: 谁不会呢？给 来杯酒压压惊

translation.en: Uh, I'm agoraphobic.
translation.zh: 我有恐旷症

translation.en: I can't go outside.
translation.zh: 我出不了门

translation.en: You're stuck inside this shitty house. Oh. [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 所以你被困在了这间破房子里

translation.en: Oh, man. I'd hate to be stuck inside a house this shitty.
translation.zh: 天啊 我肯定受不了被困在这么糟糕的房子里

translation.en: Is that your husband coming home?
translation.zh: 是你丈夫回来了吗？

translation.en: It's my tenant.
translation.zh: 那是我的租客

translation.en: He lives in the basement.
translation.zh: 他住我家地下室

translation.en: So, um, what do you do all day? I mean, do you work?
translation.zh: 那你每天都做些什么？我是说 你有工作吗？

translation.en: Oh, God, I'm so fucking nosy.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我打听太多了

translation.en: I… I should just go. Um--
translation.zh: 我该走了

translation.en: -Do you want me to go? -No.
translation.zh: -你希望我走吗？-不用

translation.en: No, it's… It's all right. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 别走 没关系 我没事

translation.en: I… counsel people.
translation.zh: 我给人提供辅导

translation.en: You counsel people?
translation.zh: 你给人提供辅导？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Oh, you're a shrink.
translation.zh: 你是心理医生

translation.en: Oh! [chuckles] That's a twist.
translation.zh: 真想不到！

translation.en: You married?
translation.zh: 你结婚了吗？

translation.en: -Separated. -Ah.
translation.zh: 分居了

translation.en: And kids?
translation.zh: 孩子呢？

translation.en: My daughter Olivia is with her father.
translation.zh: 我女儿奥莉维亚和她爸爸住一起

translation.en: Oh, that's tough.
translation.zh: 真不容易

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Yeah. Separated from your kid, that's really tough.
translation.zh: 对 要和孩子分开 那真的很难受吧

translation.en: I talk to them every day.
translation.zh: 我每天和他们通电话

translation.en: Yeah, it's just… It's--
translation.zh: 对 但是…

translation.en: It's not the same as them being here, though, is it?
translation.zh: 这和他们就在身边还是不一样 对吧？

translation.en: Take another drink, please.
translation.zh: 请再喝点吧

translation.en: -Do you wanna go outside? -You know, I have a shrink of my own.
translation.zh: -你想到外面去吗？-我其实有个专门的心理医生

translation.en: [laughing] Okay. Okay. I get it. I get it.
translation.zh: 好 我明白了 好的 抱歉

translation.en: All right, sorry. That sounds very wise.
translation.zh: 好 我明白了 好的 抱歉 -看心理医生听起来很明智-是的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: -看心理医生听起来很明智-是的

translation.en: I get it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我懂

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: We've been trying to get me to go outside using an umbrella.
translation.zh: 我们一直想试试打着伞能不能走出去

translation.en: I haven't… been able to do it yet.
translation.zh: 但我一直没能付诸行动

translation.en: You will. You will. You'll figure it out.
translation.zh: 你可以的 你能做到的

translation.en: [Jane] Notice I'm not asking what made you this way.
translation.zh: 注意 我不是要打听你为什么会成这样

translation.en: [Anna] What way? Agoraphobic.
translation.zh: -成什么样？-恐旷症

translation.en: I have anxiety. I have… an anxiety disorder.
translation.zh: 我有焦虑症 焦虑性障碍

translation.en: -Punch. [clicking tongue] Punch. -So, um…
translation.zh: 小拳头 -那…-小拳头！

translation.en: That's what all these pills are for?
translation.zh: 天啊 所以你才要吃这些药吗？

translation.en: So, what does… what does this one do? This, uh, pink one.
translation.zh: 这一瓶有什么用？粉红色这瓶…

translation.en: Uh, that's Inderal.
translation.zh: 那是心得安

translation.en: Ah. Beta blocker. How do you know that?
translation.zh: -β受体阻断药-你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Um, 'cause it says so on the bottle.
translation.zh: 因为瓶子上写了

translation.en: Pretty sure you're not supposed to be… taking these with alcohol.
translation.zh: 说真的 你在用药期间不应该喝酒

translation.en: Thank you for the candle.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的蜡烛

translation.en: Ethan brought it by. Thanks.
translation.zh: 伊森送来的 谢谢

translation.en: Oh. Wow, okay, subject change.
translation.zh: 哇 好吧 换话题了

translation.en: I think I hurt my neck.
translation.zh: 我好像扭到脖子了

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -He's a nice boy.
translation.zh: 他是个好孩子

translation.en: -Look. -Oh, what a cutie.
translation.zh: -你看-真可爱

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah. He's my guy. My little baby guy.
translation.zh: 嘿 他是我的小小男子汉

translation.en: You know, when you have a kid, you say, "He's my kid, my guy,"
translation.zh: 有了孩子以后你会说：“这是我孩子 我儿子”

translation.en: Like he's yours, like he belongs to you.
translation.zh: 就好像他是你的 归你所有

translation.en: -That's not really how it feels. -You belong to them.
translation.zh: 但其实根本不是这回事 -你归他们所有-对

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: -你归他们所有-对

translation.en: Right. You belong to them. And maybe you never belonged to anybody before.
translation.zh: 非常对 你归你的孩子们所有也许从前你没觉得自己属于谁

translation.en: I mean, maybe, maybe you thought you belonged to your parents.
translation.zh: 也许你曾以为你是属于父母的后来你长大离开了父母

translation.en: You grew out of that. You certainly didn't belong to your husband.
translation.zh: 也许你曾以为你是属于父母的后来你长大离开了父母 显然你也不属于丈夫

translation.en: Then this kid comes along, and he's just got you.
translation.zh: 可是当你有了孩子他就牢牢拴住了你

translation.en: [laughs] I don't have to tell you that.
translation.zh: 这用不着我告诉你

translation.en: I like your earrings.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的耳环

translation.en: Oh. Oh, thanks, yeah. A gift. They're a gift from an old boyfriend.
translation.zh: 谢谢 是啊 别人送的是前男友送我的

translation.en: Does your husband mind?
translation.zh: 你丈夫不介意吗？

translation.en: I doubt he knows.
translation.zh: 我估计他不知道

translation.en: He has trust issues.
translation.zh: 他很难相信别人

translation.en: Oh, why is that?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: -Oh, I don't know. -You don't know? Mmm.
translation.zh: -我不知道-你不知道？

translation.en: No. Come on, no, no. I don't know. I don't know. -No, it's… [clears throat] -Hmm.
translation.zh: 不！别问了！我不知道 不…

translation.en: [sucks teeth] Who knows why he has them? Um…
translation.zh: 天知道他为什么不相信别人？

translation.en: He's a good guy, he's a good father. He's just, you know…
translation.zh: 他是个好人 是个好父亲但是他 你知道…

translation.en: -He's tight. -[Anna] Mm. Controlling, and like…
translation.zh: 他紧张易怒 控制欲很强 而且…

translation.en: I have my own issues, but I work through them and…
translation.zh: 我自己也有心理障碍 但是我会调节 我可以应对那些情绪

translation.en: I can handle them.
translation.zh: 但是我会调节 我可以应对那些情绪

translation.en: Maybe sometimes I have to… get in between them and I--
translation.zh: 也许有时候 我还是会陷入焦虑而且我…

translation.en: I worry about Ethan, 'cause…
translation.zh: 我会担心伊森 因为…

translation.en: he's sensitive.
translation.zh: 他很敏感

translation.en: Family's… complicated.
translation.zh: 家事嘛 太复杂了

translation.en: Why is your family complicated?
translation.zh: 你们家为什么复杂？

translation.en: -[Jane] Look. -Oh, wow! That's amazing!
translation.zh: 你看 -画得真好！-是吧！简拉塞尔的原创作品

translation.en: Yeah. Jane Russell original.
translation.zh: -画得真好！-是吧！简拉塞尔的原创作品

translation.en: -See how I changed the subject on you? -I did.
translation.zh: -看到没？我也成功转换了话题-发现了

translation.en: Yeah, you don't know who you're fooling with.
translation.zh: 对 你可不知道你是在和谁玩儿呢

translation.en: -[laughter] -[indistinct conversation]
translation.zh: 我在挑战你…

translation.en: [Anna] Hello?
translation.zh: 你好？

translation.en: Uh, it's Alistair Russell. We-we-we we moved in just across the street. 101.
translation.zh: 我是阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔我们刚搬进街对面的101号

translation.en: -[buzzer sounds] -[Anna] Push the door.
translation.zh: 推门进来

translation.en: I… I'm sorry to bother you. I just wanted to know…
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰了 我只是想问问…

translation.en: Well, I'm just curious if any of my family has come around to see you this evening.
translation.zh: 我想知道今晚我家有没有谁来找过你

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: No, I-- I've been alone.
translation.zh: 没有 我一个人在家

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: Sorry to bother you.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰了

translation.en: Thank your wife.
translation.zh: 代我谢谢你妻子的蜡烛

translation.en: For the candle. Ethan brought it over.
translation.zh: 代我谢谢你妻子的蜡烛 伊森几天前送来的

translation.en: Days ago.
translation.zh: 伊森几天前送来的

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -[muffled clanging] -[cat yowls]
translation.zh: （星期三）

translation.en: [dispatcher] 911, what's your emergency?
translation.zh: 911 您有什么紧急情况？

translation.en: [Anna] I think there's somebody in my house.
translation.zh: 好像有人偷偷进了我家

translation.en: What's your address, ma'am?
translation.zh: 女士 请问您的住址是哪里？

translation.en: It's 104, West 121st Street.
translation.zh: 121街西区104号

translation.en: -[screams] I'm sorry. -[man] Whoa!
translation.zh: -嘿！-抱歉

translation.en: -It's David. -[dispatcher] Ma'am, are you okay?
translation.zh: -嘿 是我 戴维-女士 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -我很好 对不起-女士？

translation.en: -Ma'am? -Yeah, I know him. It's a false alarm. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 是我认识的人 虚惊一场 抱歉

translation.en: I-- I buzzed. I did buzz half an hour ago.
translation.zh: 我按了门铃 半小时前按的

translation.en: And I cleaned the eggs off your front porch.
translation.zh: 我把门廊上的碎鸡蛋清理了

translation.en: What are you looking for?
translation.zh: 你在找什么？

translation.en: A guy across the street asked me to help him open some boxes, store some stuff.
translation.zh: 街对面有个人让我帮他开几个箱子用来存放东西

translation.en: I thought you might have a box cutter.
translation.zh: 我想你这儿应该有开箱刀

translation.en: I didn't know you were a handyman. I thought you were a singer-songwriter.
translation.zh: 原来你还干修理工的活儿我一直以为你是个创作型歌手

translation.en: Which is why I am a handyman.
translation.zh: 所以我才要当修理工挣钱啊

translation.en: You know you've got mold?
translation.zh: 你家都发霉了

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: David, come back inside!
translation.zh: 戴维 你快进来

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: -Boo! -[gasps]
translation.zh: 吓死我了

translation.en: [David] You're gonna need a pro to seal that roof. It's dangerous.
translation.zh: 你得找个专业的来把屋顶密封一下 太危险了

translation.en: I'll call somebody.
translation.zh: 我会找人的

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Who were you working with across the street?
translation.zh: 街对面是谁找你干活儿？

translation.en: Russell.
translation.zh: 拉塞尔

translation.en: You know him?
translation.zh: 你认识他吗？

translation.en: How did he find you? I put up some flyers.
translation.zh: -他怎么找到你的？-我张贴了小广告

translation.en: -[screaming continues] -[man shouting]
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [Anna] Alistair Russell. West 121st Street.
translation.zh: 阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔 121街西区

translation.en: -[operator on phone] Is this a residence? -Uh, yes.
translation.zh: -请问这是住宅地址吗？-是的

translation.en: Press one to have this number texted to you.
translation.zh: 请按1 该号码将通过短信发送给您

translation.en: Oh, Jesus.
translation.zh: 真麻烦

translation.en: -[Ethan on phone] Uh, hello? -[Anna] Ethan.
translation.zh: 喂？ 伊森？我是安娜 住你家对面的

translation.en: It's Anna, across the street.
translation.zh: 伊森？我是安娜 住你家对面的

translation.en: Is something going on over there? I heard a scream.
translation.zh: 你家那边出事了吗？我听到有人尖叫

translation.en: No, no. It's fine.
translation.zh: 没 一切都好

translation.en: I heard somebody scream. Was it you?
translation.zh: 我听到了尖叫声 是你吗？

translation.en: No. [stifles sob]
translation.zh: 不是 我没事

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: [Ethan] He just… It's fine.
translation.zh: 他只是…我们没事

translation.en: -Ethan, do you need-- -[line disconnects]
translation.zh: 伊森 你需要帮助…

translation.en: -Hello? -[Alistair] Yes, you called my number?
translation.zh: -喂？-喂？ 你给我家打电话了吗？

translation.en: Hi, this is Anna Fox from across the street.
translation.zh: 您好 我是安娜福克斯 住在街对面

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 有什么事？

translation.en: I… heard somebody scream just now. I wanted to call to check on…
translation.zh: 刚才我听到有人尖叫所以打电话问一下…

translation.en: Sorry, you heard what?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你听到了什么？

translation.en: -A scream. A scream. -[Alistair panting] Uh, a minute ago.
translation.zh: 尖叫 一声尖叫 在一分钟前

translation.en: A scream?
translation.zh: 一声尖叫？

translation.en: Yeah, from your house.
translation.zh: 是的 从你家传来的

translation.en: Sorry, the only people here are me and my boy.
translation.zh: 抱歉 家里只有我和我儿子我们没有尖叫

translation.en: -And we didn't scream. -I heard…
translation.zh: 抱歉 家里只有我和我儿子我们没有尖叫 可我听到…

translation.en: [on voicemail] This is David, I'm not here right now.
translation.zh: 喂 我是戴维 现在不方便接听电话

translation.en: Leave a message and I'll do my best to get back to you.
translation.zh: 请留言 我会尽快回电

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: -You hear that scream across the street? -No.
translation.zh: -你听到了街对面传来的尖叫声吗？-没有

translation.en: Now. Five minutes ago. I was listening to music.
translation.zh: -就刚才 大概五分钟前-刚才我在听音乐

translation.en: You didn't hear anybody scream?
translation.zh: 你没听到有人尖叫吗？

translation.en: -I didn't hear anyone scream. -[woman crying]
translation.zh: 我没听到尖叫声

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Come in here.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: Can I get you something? Something to eat?
translation.zh: 你要不要吃点什么？我给你弄？

translation.en: No, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 不用了

translation.en: Are you?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: Ethan, what's going on over there?
translation.zh: 伊森 你家出了什么事？

translation.en: He's not a bad guy.
translation.zh: 我爸他不是坏人

translation.en: He has a lot of stress. It builds up in him and has to get it out.
translation.zh: 他只是压力太大积压久了需要发泄出来

translation.en: -It's all right. -It's not all right.
translation.zh: -一切都好-不好 别这么说了

translation.en: Stop saying it's all right. It's clearly not all right.
translation.zh: -一切都好-不好 别这么说了 这种情况显然并不好

translation.en: I've gotta go home. I should not have come over.
translation.zh: 我该回家了 我不应该来找你的对不起 我只是…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I just…
translation.zh: 我不应该来找你的对不起 我只是…

translation.en: [Anna] No, wait.
translation.zh: 别走！等等

translation.en: [Ethan] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Why are you so nice to me?
translation.zh: 你为什么对我这么好？

translation.en: Because children need protection.
translation.zh: 因为孩子需要被保护

translation.en: [sneezes] Sorry. The cat.
translation.zh: 抱歉 对猫过敏

translation.en: I want you to take my number.
translation.zh: 你把我的手机号记一下

translation.en: Is your mom okay?
translation.zh: 你妈妈还好吗？

translation.en: [Ethan] Yeah, I… I guess so.
translation.zh: 还好吧 应该还好

translation.en: I mean, she has to take his side. [Anna] Okay. Um…
translation.zh: -毕竟 她只能站他那边-好吧

translation.en: All right, look.
translation.zh: 好的 听着…

translation.en: Ethan?
translation.zh: 伊森…

translation.en: Look, Ethan, um, whatever is going on over there…
translation.zh: 听着 伊森 不论你家出了什么事

translation.en: no matter how bad it gets… this is a safe place.
translation.zh: 不论情况有多严重 这里是安全的

translation.en: You can always come here.
translation.zh: 你可以随时过来

translation.en: Always. Yeah.
translation.zh: -任何时候-好

translation.en: [Anna] You never know what the right thing is to do.
translation.zh: 你永远不知道怎么做才是正确的

translation.en: You want to call Children's Protective Services,
translation.zh: （星期四） 给儿童保护机构打电话？但我和他爸会各执一词

translation.en: it's my word against the father's.
translation.zh: 给儿童保护机构打电话？但我和他爸会各执一词

translation.en: -[man] Want advice? -[Anna] No.
translation.zh: -想听我的建议吗？-不

translation.en: [man] Don't go look into other people's houses.
translation.zh: 不要窥探别人家的情况

translation.en: [Anna] Karl says curiosity is healthy.
translation.zh: 卡尔说好奇有利于心理健康

translation.en: [man] You said he was getting off on controlling you.
translation.zh: 你说他很享受对你的控制

translation.en: [Anna] You said we could talk whenever I wanted to.
translation.zh: 你还说我可以随时找你聊天

translation.en: [Karl] Everything okay, Anna? [Anna] What's up?
translation.zh: -一切还好吗 安娜？-什么事？

translation.en: [Karl] You left a message.
translation.zh: 你给我留言了

translation.en: -No, I don't think so. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 没有 我没留言

translation.en: If I knew how to work my phone I could play it back for you.
translation.zh: 要是知道怎么操作 我可以放给你听

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: [Anna] I'm watching David leave the house.
translation.zh: 我正看着戴维离开

translation.en: [Karl] Looks like fun, right?
translation.zh: 看来很有意思 是吧？

translation.en: Looks like he's escaping.
translation.zh: 他好像要逃跑

translation.en: I'm gonna give you another number, Anna.
translation.zh: 我给你另一个电话号码 安娜

translation.en: I don't like the idea of missing your call while we're adjusting these new meds.
translation.zh: 我不想在调整用药的期间再错过你的电话

translation.en: [in English] Bitch.
translation.zh: 贱人

translation.en: [man on TV] Is that why you visit murder trials?
translation.zh: 所以你才要旁听谋杀案审判？

translation.en: No. I went because your case was like my father's.
translation.zh: 不是 我去旁听是因为你的案子和我父亲的类似

translation.en: I know he didn't kill my stepmother.
translation.zh: 我知道他没有杀害我的…

translation.en: You've been bad.
translation.zh: 你不是个好人

translation.en: It's 9:50. And…
translation.zh: 现在9点50分…

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Don't go looking into other people's houses, Punch.
translation.zh: 不要窥探别人家 小拳头

translation.en: I'm gonna give you some shots that'll freeze your face.
translation.zh: 我会给你打几针 让你的脸失去知觉

translation.en: Now, just close your eyes.
translation.zh: 好了 闭上眼睛

translation.en: -It'll be all right, Vincent. -[Anna gasps] It'll be all right.
translation.zh: 没事的 文森特 没事的

translation.en: Hold your breath, cross your fingers.
translation.zh: 屏住呼吸 交叉手指

translation.en: Where's my phone?
translation.zh: 我的手机呢？

translation.en: Where's my phone? Backtrack. Backtrack, backtrack. Keep doing it, keep doing it.
translation.zh: 我的手机呢？回想一下

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 到底在哪里？

translation.en: Give him hell, Jane.
translation.zh: 给他点厉害瞧瞧 简

translation.en: [man on TV] Just close your eyes. I've got a fine anesthetic…
translation.zh: 闭上眼睛 你不会有事的

translation.en: [Anna] Where's my phone?
translation.zh: 我的手机呢？

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: [dispatcher] 911 operator, what's your emergency?
translation.zh: 911接线员 您有什么紧急情况？

translation.en: -My neighbor, Jane, she's been stabbed. -Slow down, ma'am.
translation.zh: 我的邻居简被人捅了一刀 您说慢些 女士您叫什么 现在在哪里？

translation.en: What's your name and where are you?
translation.zh: 您说慢些 女士您叫什么 现在在哪里？

translation.en: [fumbling] I'm Anna Fox. I'm Anna.
translation.zh: 我叫安娜福克斯 我叫安娜

translation.en: And where are you?
translation.zh: 那您此刻在哪里？

translation.en: Um, 104, West 121st Street.
translation.zh: 121街西区104号

translation.en: That's 121?
121. Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: -121 是吗？-121 是的 您说看到邻居被刺伤？

translation.en: You say your neighbor was stabbed?
translation.zh: 您说看到邻居被刺伤？

translation.en: He just turned out the lights.
translation.zh: 他刚刚把灯都关了

translation.en: Where is your neighbor?
translation.zh: 您的邻居在哪里？

translation.en: She is across the street. And…
translation.zh: -她在街对面 我…-您有她的地址吗？

translation.en: -Do you have an address? -Yes.
translation.zh: -她在街对面 我…-您有她的地址吗？ 有 124街西区104号

translation.en: 104, West 124th Street.
translation.zh: 有 124街西区104号

translation.en: Wait, you said "124th Street"?
translation.zh: 等等 您说124街？

translation.en: 121st Street!
Help is on the way, ma'am. I need you to calm down.
translation.zh: 我们正派人赶过来 女士 -请您保持镇定-好的

translation.en: -Okay. -Are you with your neighbor now?
translation.zh: -请您保持镇定-好的 -您在邻居身边吗？-她在街对面

translation.en: She is across the street. I told you that and you are not listening to me!
translation.zh: -您在邻居身边吗？-她在街对面 我刚说过了 你有没有听清楚！

translation.en: [dispatcher] Anna! Ma'am. Anna, did you stab your neighbor?
translation.zh: 安娜！女士！安娜 您刺伤了邻居吗？

translation.en: Help me! Help me!
translation.zh: 救救我！

translation.en: Jane. I'm coming, Jane.
translation.zh: 简！我来了 简！

translation.en: I'm coming, Jane. I'm coming, Jane.
translation.zh: 我来了 简！我来了！

translation.en: I'm coming, Jane. I'm coming, Jane. I'm coming, Jane.
translation.zh: 我来了 简！

translation.en: [man] Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Detective Little. NYPD. I was hoping I could ask you some questions.
translation.zh: 我是纽约市警局的利特尔探员想问您几个问题

translation.en: What are you doing in my house?
translation.zh: 你来我家干什么？

translation.en: I understand you have a tenant downstairs. He home?
translation.zh: 我了解到你家楼下有租户

translation.en: I… I don't know.
translation.zh: -他在家吗？-我不知道

translation.en: -That your daughter? -Is she here?
translation.zh: -那是你女儿吗？-她在吗？

translation.en: She's with her father. What happened to Jane?
translation.zh: 她在她爸爸那儿 简怎么样了？

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -What is this? -Ma'am, you all right?
translation.zh: -这怎么回事？-你还好吗？

translation.en: No, why is he here?
translation.zh: 他怎么在这儿？

translation.en: Mr. Russell believes that you made a mistake…
translation.zh: 拉塞尔先生认为你弄错了…

translation.en: You have never met my wife.
translation.zh: 你从没见过我妻子

translation.en: She helped me one night. We spent the evening together.
translation.zh: 有天晚上 她帮了我我们一起待了好久

translation.en: No, no. No, I don't think so.
translation.zh: 不 没这回事

translation.en: In fact, he came here looking for her.
translation.zh: 事实上 他还来我这里找过她

translation.en: I was looking for my son, not my wife. You told me no one had been here.
translation.zh: 我是来找我儿子 不是找妻子你说没人来过你家

translation.en: I lied.
translation.zh: 我说谎了

translation.en: We played gin.
translation.zh: 我和你妻子玩了纸牌

translation.en: -Why would you lie about that? -Why would you lie about that?
translation.zh: -为什么要为这种事说谎？-你为什么要说谎？

translation.en: I was afraid that you would punish her.
translation.zh: 我担心你会因此责罚她

translation.en: For playing gin? It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: -就因为玩纸牌？-这不是重点

translation.en: The point is, Dr. Fox, that nothing's happened.
translation.zh: 重点是 什么也没发生 福克斯医生

translation.en: No! I know what I saw!
translation.zh: -不对 我知道我看到了什么-没有任何人受伤

translation.en: -Nothing's happened to anyone. -No, I was zoomed in with the camera.
translation.zh: -不对 我知道我看到了什么-没有任何人受伤 我还用相机拉近了看的

translation.en: -Did you take a picture? -I did not!
translation.zh: -你拍照了吗？-没

translation.en: She's just admitted she's spying on our house.
translation.zh: 她刚刚承认自己窥探我家

translation.en: -Mr. Russell… -Why didn't you take a picture?
translation.zh: -请…-你为什么没有拍照？

translation.en: The important thing is, is that everybody's okay, yeah?
translation.zh: 重要的是 现在大家都没事 好吗？

translation.en: Then where is she?
translation.zh: 那她在哪里？

translation.en: Where's Jane?
translation.zh: 简在哪里？

translation.en: [woman] I'm sorry we haven't met.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我们之前从未见过

translation.en: I'm Jane Russell.
translation.zh: 我是简拉塞尔

translation.en: She's not Jane.
translation.zh: 她不是简

translation.en: I promise I am.
translation.zh: 我向你保证我是

translation.en: No, you're not Jane. She's not Jane. I know Jane. Jane's been in my house!
translation.zh: 不 你不是简 她不是简我认识简 简来过我家

translation.en: This is absurd.
translation.zh: 这太奇怪了

translation.en: That's Jane Russell. Get Ethan.
translation.zh: -她就是简拉塞尔-找伊森来

translation.en: Are you okay, Dr. Fox?
translation.zh: 你还好吗 福克斯医生？

translation.en: Tell them.
translation.zh: 你告诉他们

translation.en: You've never met my mother.
translation.zh: 你确实从没见过我妈妈

translation.en: Well, this has been great fun.
translation.zh: 好了 这次来拜访非常愉快

translation.en: See you at the block party.
translation.zh: 下次社区聚会时再见

translation.en: You made a 911 call yesterday about an intruder in your house?
translation.zh: 昨天你打了911说有人闯入你家？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有 我是说 对

translation.en: I mean, yes. But that was a mistake.
translation.zh: 没有 我是说 对 但是我弄错了 这…

translation.en: It's a criminal offense to make false police reports.
translation.zh: 报假警是违法的

translation.en: Thank you, Detective.
translation.zh: 多谢提醒 探员

translation.en: Am I okay to leave you alone, Dr. Fox?
translation.zh: 能放心让你一个人待着吗福克斯医生？

translation.en: Look, you need anything, you, um, you call me. Day or night. Hmm?
translation.zh: 你有任何需要 就给我打电话不论白天还是晚上

translation.en: I have four kids. I don't sleep. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我家有四个孩子 我不用睡觉的

translation.en: Be well, Dr. Fox.
translation.zh: 保重 福克斯医生

translation.en: -[man] Why didn't you take a picture? -[Anna] I was trying to help her.
translation.zh: 你为什么没有拍照？ 我想帮她 没想让她史上留名

translation.en: Not record it for posterity. Are you doubting me, too?
translation.zh: 我想帮她 没想让她史上留名 -你也怀疑我吗？-我是站你这边的

translation.en: -[man] I'm on your side. -You don't sound like it.
translation.zh: -你也怀疑我吗？-我是站你这边的 听着一点也不像

translation.en: -Understandable they don't believe you. -[Anna] Because I didn't take a picture?
translation.zh: 但他们不相信你也合情合理 -就因为我没拍照吗？-因为你生着病

translation.en: [man] Because you're not healthy. And I'm not sure you're getting better.
translation.zh: -就因为我没拍照吗？-因为你生着病 而我也不知道你有没有好转

translation.en: [woman] Atkinson, New York.
translation.zh: 这里是纽约阿特金森

translation.en: Hello, I'm trying to reach Alistair Russell.
translation.zh: 您好 我想找阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔

translation.en: -[whispers] Jane Russell, Jane Russell… -[on phone] This is Shelly.
translation.zh: （简拉塞尔） -我是雪莉-你好 雪莉

translation.en: Hi, Shelly. I'm trying to reach Alistair Russell
translation.zh: -我是雪莉-你好 雪莉 我想找阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔琼让我来问你

translation.en: and Joan said that I should speak to you.
translation.zh: 我想找阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔琼让我来问你

translation.en: He doesn't work here.
translation.zh: -他不在这里工作-我听说他调到了曼哈顿

translation.en: -I thought he transferred to Manhattan. -Yes, but not with us.
translation.zh: -他不在这里工作-我听说他调到了曼哈顿 是的 但不在我们这儿

translation.en: Oh, he left Atkinson?
translation.zh: 他离开阿特金森了吗？

translation.en: [sighs] You could try calling Boston. I really don't know much about it.
translation.zh: 你可以打电话问波士顿办事处我确实不太清楚

translation.en: Well, it couldn't have happened very long ago.
translation.zh: 他是在不久前才调到波士顿的

translation.en: You're gonna wanna call Boston.
translation.zh: 你应该给波士顿办事处打电话

translation.en: "My heart is broken forever, but Pam's memorial was brightened
translation.zh: “我将永远为此心痛 但对帕米拉的悼念不会因此失色

translation.en: by so many uplifting letters and messages from Atkinson co-workers."
translation.zh: 因为有来自阿特金森各位同事的如此多鼓舞人心的信件和留言”

translation.en: "Thank you, Alistair Russell."
translation.zh: “谢谢 阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔”

translation.en: "Thank you, Alistair Russell"?
translation.zh: 谢谢 阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔？

translation.en: Pamela Nazin.
translation.zh: 帕米拉内辛

translation.en: "Pamela Nazin, 47, an executive with The Atkinson Group in Boston
translation.zh: “帕米拉内辛 47岁阿特金森集团波士顿办事处的高管

translation.en: was found dead early Thursday morning…
translation.zh: 于周四清晨被人发现死亡”

translation.en: …in the parking lot of…"
translation.zh: “停车场…”

translation.en: Steve Runyan. How can I help you?
translation.zh: 史蒂夫鲁尼恩 请问有何事？

translation.en: [Anna] Hi, Steve. My name is Carol,
translation.zh: 你好 史蒂夫 我是卡罗尔

translation.en: and I am calling to verify some information on an insurance policy.
translation.zh: 我打电话来向您核实一些有关保险条款的信息

translation.en: -[Steve] Okay. -Are you in human resources?
translation.zh: -好的-您在人力资源部吗？

translation.en: [Steve] Oh, sorry, not in Boston.
translation.zh: 抱歉 不是波士顿的大公司的小办事处

translation.en: Big company, small office. You'd have to call New York.
translation.zh: 抱歉 不是波士顿的大公司的小办事处 你得给纽约总部打电话

translation.en: [Anna] Okay, because they suggested that I, uh, call up there.
translation.zh: 好吧 可是他们建议我打这里的电话

translation.en: [Steve] Who's the employee?
translation.zh: 你要找哪个员工？

translation.en: [Anna] It's Inderal.
translation.zh: 那是心得安

translation.en: [Anna] Um, Pamela Nazin.
translation.zh: 帕米拉内辛

translation.en: "Authorities believe Miss Nazin fell from the terrace of her unit
translation.zh: “当局认为内辛女士 是从六楼公寓的阳台坠落身亡”

translation.en: on the sixth floor."
translation.zh: 是从六楼公寓的阳台坠落身亡”

translation.en: [Anna] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: [Steve] No, no, it's cool. I knew her, so maybe I can help.
translation.zh: 不 没关系我认识她 也许能帮上忙

translation.en: What was her job title?
translation.zh: 她的职位是什么？

translation.en: [Steve] I guess she was an executive assistant.
translation.zh: 她好像是高层的助理

translation.en: [Anna] Assistant to whom?
translation.zh: 是谁的助理？

translation.en: [Steve] Her boss.
translation.zh: 她老板的

translation.en: Alistair Russell.
translation.zh: 阿利斯泰尔拉塞尔

translation.en: Is he still with the company?
translation.zh: 此人还在公司任职吗？

translation.en: [Steve] What makes you say that?
translation.zh: 为什么这么问？

translation.en: I see here I have an address. I know he transferred to Manhattan.
translation.zh: 我这里有一个地址我知道他被调到了曼哈顿

translation.en: [Steve] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I know that he moved shortly after Miss Nazin's passing.
translation.zh: 据我所知他在内辛女士去世后不久就迁居了

translation.en: [Steve] If you know that, then why are you asking?
translation.zh: 既然你知道 你还问什么？

translation.en: [Anna] Oh, I just, um… With files like this, we like to…
translation.zh: 我只是…像这样的情况 我们一般…

translation.en: We have questions on cause of death. We just--
translation.zh: 我们对于死因还有些疑问所以我们想…

translation.en: [Steve] Tell you what. Give me your number, let me call you back?
translation.zh: 这样吧 你留个电话 我稍后联系你

translation.en: [Jane] Yeah, that's my guy.
translation.zh: 是的 他是我的小小男子汉

translation.en: Yeah, you know, when you have a kid, you say, "That's my kid, that's my guy,"
translation.zh: 有了孩子以后你会说：“这是我孩子 我儿子”

translation.en: like he's yours…
translation.zh: 就好像他是你的…

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: -What the… -[gasps] What are you doing?
translation.zh: 干什么…你在干什么？

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 吓死我了

translation.en: -Um, I was looking for you. -What is that?
translation.zh: -我刚才在找你-那是什么？

translation.en: -Are you going through my mail? -[Anna] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你在偷看我的信件吗？ -抱歉-不是吧

translation.en: -[David] Unreal. -I-- I-- I knocked.
translation.zh: 我敲过门的

translation.en: I just… I needed to ask you a question.
translation.zh: 我有问题要问你

translation.en: Ask me what? Huh? Here I am, what's your question?
translation.zh: 问我什么？我在这儿呢 有什么问题？

translation.en: Jane.
translation.zh: 简

translation.en: Have you met her? Have you met the woman across the street?
translation.zh: 你见过她吗？你见过住在街对面的那个女人吗？

translation.en: -Jane? -Jane Russell?
translation.zh: -简？-简拉塞尔

translation.en: -No. -You worked with them.
translation.zh: -没-你给他们家干过活儿

translation.en: I worked for him. For Mr. Russell. I never met his wife.
translation.zh: 我只给拉塞尔先生干过活儿从没见过他妻子

translation.en: What am I, your messenger now?
translation.zh: 我现在成了你的传话筒了吗？

translation.en: Pick up the phone and call him!
translation.zh: 拿起电话给他打过去 安娜！

translation.en: Better yet, why don't you take a stroll across the street! -No? -[door slams]
translation.zh: 或者干脆走过那条街去找他！不要吗？

translation.en: You seem really upset. Why would that be, Anna?
translation.zh: -你看起来非常烦躁-你觉得是为什么呢 安娜？

translation.en: Yes, I have a parole problem.
translation.zh: 对 我为假释的事烦着呢

translation.en: Huh? You wanna read it? Here you go.
translation.zh: 你想看吗？给你看

translation.en: -No, it was on the floor. -I'm in violation.
translation.zh: -我只是把信捡起来-我犯了法

translation.en: I'm supposed to be in Springfield, Massachusetts.
translation.zh: 我本该在马萨诸塞的斯普林菲尔德市

translation.en: -Okay. -No, not okay!
translation.zh: -好的-不 不好！

translation.en: It was a bar fight.
translation.zh: 酒吧里有人动手

translation.en: I was in the wrong place at the wrong time and I got fucking jumped and I reacted!
translation.zh: 我只是碰巧撞上了他们冷不防被人揍了 于是我就反击了！

translation.en: -God! -[gasps]
translation.zh: 倒霉！

translation.en: I shouldn't have come down here.
translation.zh: 我不该下来的

translation.en: Look, I'm working on it.
translation.zh: 听着 我正在想办法解决

translation.en: I'm going to Connecticut to see a guy about it.
translation.zh: 今晚要去康涅狄格 明早去见一个人

translation.en: Okay. I'm dealing with it.
translation.zh: -好的-我正在想办法摆平这事儿

translation.en: Why don't we pretend this never happened?
translation.zh: 要不咱们假装这件事没有发生过？

translation.en: We're cool, right?
translation.zh: 我们俩之间没事 对吧？

translation.en: [softly] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Just give me a couple of days to get on top of it.
translation.zh: 再给我几天时间 我会摆平的

translation.en: [man] David, come on, let's go!
translation.zh: 戴维 快点 该走了

translation.en: [David] Man, we need to talk about it.
translation.zh: 让我离开这儿

translation.en: [woman] I think you know who I am.
translation.zh: 你应该知道我是谁

translation.en: Stop watching our house or I'll call the police.
translation.zh: 不要再偷窥我家了 不然我会报警

translation.en: [Anna] Punch?
translation.zh: 小拳头？ （星期六）

translation.en: Punch?
translation.zh: 小拳头

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: Punch?
translation.zh: 小拳头？

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing down here?
translation.zh: 嘿 你跑这下面来干什么？

translation.en: Poor guy, you've been down here all night.
translation.zh: 可怜的猫咪 你一整晚都在下面？

translation.en: How did you get down here?
translation.zh: 你是怎么下来的？

translation.en: [Anna] I like your earrings. Does your husband mind?
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的耳环 谢谢 是啊 别人送的是前男友送我的

translation.en: [Jane] I doubt he knows. A gift from an old boyfriend.
translation.zh: 谢谢 是啊 别人送的是前男友送我的

translation.en: -[man] So now you don't wanna talk. -[Anna] I'm busy.
translation.zh: -你现在又不想聊了吗？-我很忙

translation.en: -[man] If I can't say what I think… -[Anna] I'm not delusional.
translation.zh: -如果我不能表达真实想法…-我没有妄想症状

translation.en: [man] Break it down. First it's the boy, then that murder across the street.
translation.zh: 你好好分析一下 亲爱的 首先是那个孩子然后是街对面的凶杀案

translation.en: Now there's another woman in Boston…
translation.zh: 现在是波士顿的另一个女人

translation.en: an earring, and fucking David, who you always liked.
translation.zh: 一枚耳环还有你一直觉得还不错的戴维…

translation.en: -[Anna] You done? -[man] With you at the center…
translation.zh: -你有完没完？-…问题在于你…

translation.en: -[Anna] Don't. -…on all those damn pills.
translation.zh: -别说了-…因为那些该死的药

translation.en: -Fuck off! -[man] There's nothing here for you.
translation.zh: 不要说了 这些事与你无关 你很清楚

translation.en: You know it. You've got to move on.
translation.zh: 这些事与你无关 你很清楚 -你该放下了-我不能

translation.en: [Anna] I don't know, I'm just not made that way.
translation.zh: -为什么不能？-我不知道 我就是不忍心不管

translation.en: I wish to God I could, believe me, but I can't.
translation.zh: 我也希望我能放手相信我 但我做不到

translation.en: Everyone else can move on. I can't.
translation.zh: 别人都能放下 向前看 可我不行

translation.en: Where's your mother?
translation.zh: 你妈妈呢？

translation.en: Stop it. Stop.
translation.zh: 别说了！住口

translation.en: Ethan? Why are you lying to me?
translation.zh: 伊森！你为什么要说谎？

translation.en: Can't scream at me on the street.
translation.zh: -我在街上 你别冲我喊-你不说 我也帮不了你…

translation.en: -I can't help you if you don't tell. -You never met my mother!
translation.zh: -我在街上 你别冲我喊-你不说 我也帮不了你… -你没见过我妈-那时候你说谎了 你知道的

translation.en: You were lying and you know it.
translation.zh: -你没见过我妈-那时候你说谎了 你知道的

translation.en: -You're just confused. -No, I know what I saw.
translation.zh: -你搞错了-没有 我知道我看到了什么

translation.en: You don't. You're just wrong. I know what I saw!
translation.zh: -你不知道 你搞错了-我知道我看到了什么

translation.en: -You don't! You're wrong! -We talked about you.
translation.zh: -你不知道 你搞错了！-我们聊到了你

translation.en: -She told me about you! -Don't do this to me!
translation.zh: -你妈说起过你！-你别再这样了！

translation.en: Why are you lying for him?!
translation.zh: 你为什么要为了他撒谎？

translation.en: Ethan.
translation.zh: 伊森…

translation.en: Why are you protecting him?
translation.zh: 你为什么要维护他？

translation.en: I can't tell you.
translation.zh: 我不能告诉你…

translation.en: -[yelps] -[Alistair] Go home!
translation.zh: 回家！

translation.en: You cannot slap that boy.
translation.zh: 你不能那样打孩子

translation.en: I've put up with a lot, Mrs. Fox, all of us have, but this--
translation.zh: 我已经忍让很多了福克斯女士 我们都容忍你 但你的行为要适可而止！

translation.en: This stops now.
translation.zh: 但你的行为要适可而止！

translation.en: Your relationship with Ethan, it's inappropriate.
translation.zh: 你和伊森的关系有失分寸

translation.en: He's a young man! He's a…
translation.zh: 他还是青少年！

translation.en: He's a boy! He's 15-and-a-half and you're a mature woman!
translation.zh: 他是个孩子！才15岁半你是个成年的女人

translation.en: And of course, you're completely out of your goddamn mind!
translation.zh: 不过当然了 你已经彻底疯了！

translation.en: [nervously] I'll call the police! Go. Go ahead.
translation.zh: -我要报警-你尽管报警

translation.en: Go ahead. I'm sure they'd love hearing from you.
translation.zh: 报警啊 他们肯定愿意听你的话

translation.en: A-- A drunken, shut-in, pill-popping cat lady!
translation.zh: 你这个喝酒嗑药 从不出门只和猫住的疯女人

translation.en: You…
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: You're fucking with the wrong family.
translation.zh: 我们家可不是好惹的

translation.en: -Stay away from my son! -[whimpering]
translation.zh: 离我儿子远点

translation.en: Please!
translation.zh: 拜托了

translation.en: There you are. That's your little kitty.
translation.zh: 这是你 这是你的小猫咪

translation.en: And there's her little nose. And all the beautiful flowers.
translation.zh: 这是你的小鼻子和这些美丽的花朵

translation.en: It's beautiful. It's hopeful.
translation.zh: 美丽 充满希望

translation.en: Hey. You got something in your foot, huh?
translation.zh: 嘿 你的脚上沾东西了吗？

translation.en: -[purring] -You got something in there?
translation.zh: 是不是脚上沾了脏东西？

translation.en: -Punch, what is it? Huh? -[Punch meows]
translation.zh: 小拳头 你踩到什么了？

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: You don't have any idea who could've sent you this?
translation.zh: 你完全想不到这会是谁发的吗？

translation.en: No, the only person who has a key is my tenant, David.
translation.zh: 想不到 只有我的租户戴维有钥匙

translation.en: Yeah, where is he? I don't know.
translation.zh: -好的 那他在哪儿？-我不知道

translation.en: -Are you having problems with David? -No. I mean, no. I…
translation.zh: 你和戴维之间有矛盾吗？ -没有 应该没 我…-上面没发现

translation.en: -[Norelli] Nothing up here. -You see, coast is clear.
translation.zh: -没有 应该没 我…-上面没发现 你看 警报解除

translation.en: -Can you track the email? -Track it?
translation.zh: -你们可以追踪邮件吗？-追踪？

translation.en: -Or trace it? Whatever. -You can't track a Gmail account.
translation.zh: -查查来源？-谷歌邮箱无法追踪

translation.en: -You could've sent this to yourself. -I'm sleeping.
translation.zh: 可能是你自己发给自己的 -我睡着了-也许你是假装睡着

translation.en: -Or you wanted to look asleep. -[Anna] I'm asleep.
translation.zh: -我睡着了-也许你是假装睡着 我真的睡着了 你什么意思？

translation.en: -What the hell? -[buzzer rings]
translation.zh: 我真的睡着了 你什么意思？

translation.en: Dr. Fox, there is no sign that anyone has been here, okay? Nothing is missing.
translation.zh: 福克斯医生 你家真的没有外人闯入的痕迹 好吗？ -什么都没丢-门窗看起来都没问题

translation.en: -[Norelli] Doors and windows look okay. -Someone has been in my house.
translation.zh: -什么都没丢-门窗看起来都没问题 真的有人进来过 我已经提供了证据

translation.en: -I have given you proof. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 真的有人进来过 我已经提供了证据

translation.en: [Alistair] She called my office in Boston!
translation.zh: 她给我们波士顿办事处打电话了你们知道吗？

translation.en: -Did you know that? She's called my house! -[Little] Damn it! Mr. Russell.
translation.zh: 她给我们波士顿办事处打电话了你们知道吗？ -她给我家打电话了！-拉塞尔先生 冷静

translation.en: Why were you fired? -She spies on our house! -All right.
translation.zh: -你为什么被解雇？-她用相机偷窥我家！

translation.en: She lured my son into her home! He is abusive.
translation.zh: -她把我儿子诱拐到家里！-那孩子受了虐待

translation.en: She is harassing my son. She is harassing my-- He hit his son. I saw him hit his son.
translation.zh: -她骚扰我儿子-他打了他儿子 我亲眼看到的

translation.en: She's delusional.
translation.zh: 她有幻觉

translation.en: Ethan told me, Jane told me, I saw him do it.
translation.zh: 伊森告诉我了 简也告诉我了我看到他家暴了

translation.en: -Um… -She is Jane!
translation.zh: 她就是简！

translation.en: You are a drunk and a drug addict and you made it all up!
translation.zh: 你是个酒鬼、瘾君子这都是你编出来的！

translation.en: You almost had me believing that and then I found this.
translation.zh: 你们差点让我信了但是我发现了这个！

translation.en: What's this? This is a picture that your wife drew and signed.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-这是你妻子画的 还有她的署名

translation.en: And you call me delusional, you motherfucker.
translation.zh: 看你还敢说我有幻觉 你这王八蛋

translation.en: -[Norelli] Hey, hey! -It's you.
translation.zh: 嘿！ 这是你画的

translation.en: She was here.
translation.zh: 她来过这里

translation.en: -That proves it. -[Alistair] That doesn't prove anything.
translation.zh: 画就是证据 这什么也证明不了

translation.en: That proves you're out of your mind.
translation.zh: 它证明你已经疯了

translation.en: What's happening?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: Door was open.
translation.zh: 我看大门开着

translation.en: -Who are you? -[David] I live downstairs.
translation.zh: -你是谁？-我住在楼下

translation.en: It's my tenant. That's David.
translation.zh: 是我的租客 他叫戴维

translation.en: -[Norelli] Got a last name, David? -No. Just David. Like Sting.
translation.zh: 那你姓什么 戴维？ 没有 就叫戴维 就是我的艺名

translation.en: It's Winters. His last name is Winters.
translation.zh: 温特斯 他姓温特斯

translation.en: It's just Winter, actually. Singular.
translation.zh: 其实是温特 没有“斯”

translation.en: Where were you last night, Mr. Winters?
translation.zh: 昨天夜里你在哪儿 温特斯先生？

translation.en: In Connecticut. On a job. Why?
translation.zh: 在康涅狄格州工作上的事 怎么了？

translation.en: Somebody took a photo of Dr. Fox in her sleep…
translation.zh: 有人在夜里2点趁福克斯女士睡着拍了她的照片

translation.en: around 2:00 a.m. and then e-mailed it to her.
translation.zh: 有人在夜里2点趁福克斯女士睡着拍了她的照片 然后把照片用邮件发给她

translation.en: Someone broke in? How do we know it was last night?
translation.zh: -有人闯进来了吗？-怎么知道是昨晚的事？

translation.en: Can anyone confirm you were in Connecticut last night?
translation.zh: 有人能证明你昨晚在康涅狄格吗？

translation.en: Yeah. The lady I was with.
translation.zh: 有 有位女士和我在一起

translation.en: I'm gonna need her number.
translation.zh: 请提供她的联系方式

translation.en: You can call her. Her name is Elizabeth.
translation.zh: 可以打电话问她 她叫伊丽莎白

translation.en: Dr. Fox says she saw a woman assaulted in Mr. Russell's house.
translation.zh: 福克斯医生说她目击一名女子在拉塞尔先生家中遇害

translation.en: You know anything about that?
translation.zh: 你知道这件事吗？

translation.en: -No. -Have you ever met Mrs. Russell?
translation.zh: -不知道-你见过拉塞尔夫人吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Her earring is beside your bed on your nightstand, that little rose.
translation.zh: 她的耳环就在你的床头柜上 小玫瑰花形的 简拉塞尔的耳环

translation.en: Jane Russell's earring.
translation.zh: 小玫瑰花形的 简拉塞尔的耳环

translation.en: What were you doing in your tenant's bedroom?
translation.zh: 你去你租客的房间干什么？

translation.en: She has some serious privacy issues.
translation.zh: 她有严重的问题 喜欢窥探他人隐私

translation.en: Well… how do you do?
translation.zh: 这可如何是好？

translation.en: That earring belongs to a woman I know.
translation.zh: 那个耳环是一个我认识的女人的

translation.en: And who is that woman?
translation.zh: 那女人是谁？

translation.en: Her name is Katherine. She spent the night here last week.
translation.zh: 她叫凯瑟琳 上周她来这里住了一晚

translation.en: You took a box cutter from me.
translation.zh: 你拿走了我的美工刀

translation.en: You loaned it to me.
translation.zh: 是你自己借我的

translation.en: Checks out. He was in Darien last night.
translation.zh: 查到了昨晚他在康涅狄格州的达里恩

translation.en: He was in prison for assault.
translation.zh: 他因为斗殴被抓起来了

translation.en: He was in prison. He shouldn't be in New York.
translation.zh: 他进了监狱 不应该出现在纽约

translation.en: He's been in her house. He must have met her.
translation.zh: 他去过拉塞尔家 一定见过她

translation.en: Her earring is beside his bed and he borrowed a knife from me,
translation.zh: 她的耳环就在他的床边 他还找我借了一把刀 他蹲过监狱

translation.en: and he's been in prison.
translation.zh: 他还找我借了一把刀 他蹲过监狱

translation.en: And he was fired from his job.
translation.zh: 而他被公司解雇了

translation.en: His assistant died.
translation.zh: 他的助理死了

translation.en: He threatened me. In my home.
translation.zh: 他还威胁过我 就在我家

translation.en: He beats his child.
translation.zh: 他经常打孩子

translation.en: I'm a child psychologist.
translation.zh: 我是儿童心理学家

translation.en: I know how to identify a child who's in danger, who's being abused.
translation.zh: 我知道如何辨别受到虐待、处境危险的孩子

translation.en: And I saw Alistair slap Ethan in my home yesterday.
translation.zh: 昨天在我家 我亲眼看到阿利斯泰尔扇了伊森一耳光

translation.en: Wait-- W--
translation.zh: 等等…

translation.en: Yes, yes. Yesterday.
translation.zh: 对了 是昨天

translation.en: I see…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I see the way that you're all looking at me.
translation.zh: 我知道你们都在用什么样的眼光看我

translation.en: I'm not crazy.
translation.zh: 我没疯

translation.en: I'm not hallucinating. Do I seem unreasonable?
translation.zh: 这些不是我的幻觉我看起来不可理喻吗？

translation.en: I have evidence.
translation.zh: 我有证据

translation.en: There was that picture that Jane drew and she signed,
translation.zh: 有简亲手画的画 还署了名

translation.en: and there's a photograph that somebody took of me while I was sleeping.
translation.zh: 有那张在我睡着以后被人偷拍的照片

translation.en: Look, it doesn't matter what you think about me,
translation.zh: 听着 我不在乎你们怎么看我

translation.en: if you approve of me, if you think that I'm reliable.
translation.zh: 同不同意我的看法是否认为我值得信任

translation.en: There is a boy in danger in that house.
translation.zh: 但那座房子里真的有个孩子处境危险

translation.en: Just help him, please.
translation.zh: 请你们救救他

translation.en: You're a father.
translation.zh: 你也是个父亲 对吗？

translation.en: I would think that you would want to help a child.
translation.zh: 我想你应该很愿意救助这个孩子

translation.en: If my husband were here…
translation.zh: 我丈夫要是在这儿

translation.en: he would help.
translation.zh: 他一定会伸出援手

translation.en: He would believe me.
translation.zh: 他一定会相信我

translation.en: [Norelli] Dr. Fox, your family is dead.
translation.zh: 福克斯医生 你的家人已经死了

translation.en: I don't know how you can live with yourself
translation.zh: 我真不知道如果孩子出了什么事

translation.en: if you let something happen to a child.
translation.zh: 你要如何活得心安

translation.en: [Norelli] I'm sorry, but your family is dead.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 但是你的家人已经死了

translation.en: Do you like the mountains, Livy?
translation.zh: 你喜欢大山吗 莉维？

translation.en: [Olivia] They look like a giant's bed.
translation.zh: 它们看起来像巨人的床

translation.en: Like a giant, sleeping under a white blanket.
translation.zh: 好像一个巨人 盖着白毯子睡着了

translation.en: [Anna] You're gonna ski in those tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天你就可以去山上滑雪了

translation.en: That one looks like a horse.
translation.zh: 那座山看起来像一匹马

translation.en: What would you name a horse if we got one?
translation.zh: 如果我们有匹马你想给它取什么名字？

translation.en: I'd call him Vixen.
translation.zh: 我要叫它狐妹妹

translation.en: A vixen is a fox.
translation.zh: 狐妹妹说的是狐狸

translation.en: It's a girl fox, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 是指母狐狸 宝贝儿

translation.en: [Olivia] What would you call a horse, Mommy?
translation.zh: 妈妈 那你要给小马取什么名字？

translation.en: "Of course, of course."
translation.zh: “当然”

translation.en: It's an old TV show.
translation.zh: 这是一部很老的电视剧里的

translation.en: I can't do it this way.
translation.zh: 这种事我办不到

translation.en: Do what?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: Do what?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: This.
translation.zh: 像这样

translation.en: This happy family vacation.
translation.zh: 假装全家一起愉快地出游

translation.en: You and I spoke in painful detail
translation.zh: 这件事我们已经详细讨论过了

translation.en: and I thought that we agreed that we would not ruin Christmas.
translation.zh: 我以为双方已经达成一致不会破环圣诞节的气氛

translation.en: And I can't do it anymore. I can't.
translation.zh: 我现在装不下去了 做不到

translation.en: The acting is foolish. It doesn't dignify our daughter.
translation.zh: 强颜欢笑太愚蠢了这并不是尊重孩子

translation.en: You don't care if she gets upset?
translation.zh: 你不担心她为此伤心难过吗？

translation.en: She should be upset. It's upsetting.
translation.zh: 她应该感到难过这件事本来就令人难过

translation.en: Well, don't blame me if she's scarred for life.
translation.zh: 如果她留下心理创伤可别怪我

translation.en: I do blame you. You're to blame.
translation.zh: 就应该怪你 本来就是你的错

translation.en: The one fucking the other person is to blame.
translation.zh: 谁出轨就是谁的错

translation.en: You wanna answer it?
translation.zh: 你要接电话吗？

translation.en: I bet that's him.
translation.zh: 肯定是他

translation.en: I'll answer it.
translation.zh: 你不接我接

translation.en: -Stop it! -Stop it!
translation.zh: -别抢-别抢了

translation.en: -[man] Anna! -[gasps]
translation.zh: 安娜！

translation.en: I'm sorry, but… your family is dead.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾 但是你的家人已经死了

translation.en: Ed? Ed! [exclaims]
translation.zh: 艾德？艾德！

translation.en: Livy?
translation.zh: 莉维？

translation.en: Livy?
translation.zh: 莉维？

translation.en: [sniffles] Olivia?
translation.zh: 奥莉维亚？

translation.en: Come on, baby. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 好了 宝贝儿

translation.en: I got you. Come on.
translation.zh: 有我在呢 来

translation.en: Olivia.
translation.zh: 奥莉维亚

translation.en: Wake up. [sniffling] Wake up!
translation.zh: 快醒醒 醒醒！

translation.en: -[call failure tone] -[signal beeping]
translation.zh: （呼叫911 通话失败）

translation.en: [Little] I talked to your doctor, Dr. Landy.
translation.zh: 我和你的医生聊过 也就是兰迪医生

translation.en: And you have had a hell of a time.
translation.zh: 你有一段痛苦的经历

translation.en: And I think you actually believe that you met this lady
translation.zh: 我认为你相信自己见过这位女士

translation.en: just like how you believe you're talking to your family.
translation.zh: 就和你相信自己仍与家人保持通话一样

translation.en: Your doctor said that your meds can cause hallucinations.
translation.zh: 你的医生说 你的药物会导致幻觉

translation.en: Maybe that's okay by you.
translation.zh: 也许幻觉对你来说是好事

translation.en: [scoffs] I know it'd be okay by me.
translation.zh: 换作是我 也一样

translation.en: -Jane Russell… -Yeah, she, uh… -She checks out. -[Jane 2 sighs]
translation.zh: -简拉塞尔…-她的说法查证了

translation.en: This lady here, from 101…
translation.zh: 这位住在101号的女士…

translation.en: she is who she says she is.
translation.zh: 她的身份与她所说的一致

translation.en: She is Jane Russell.
translation.zh: 她就是简拉塞尔

translation.en: -Now, as for what you saw that night-- -Um…
translation.zh: -至于那天晚上你看到的事情…-十…

translation.en: I'm so, so sorry.
translation.zh: 十分抱歉

translation.en: Of course. Your wife is who she says she is.
translation.zh: 不用说了 你的妻子自称是谁就是谁

translation.en: Of course she is.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 她就是…

translation.en: Of course… you are.
translation.zh: 你当然是

translation.en: I'm really sorry that I involved you in…
translation.zh: 真抱歉我把你们牵扯进这一切

translation.en: all of this.
translation.zh: 真抱歉我把你们牵扯进这一切 我…

translation.en: I'm so sorry that I mixed Ethan up in this.
translation.zh: 很抱歉把伊森卷了进来

translation.en: I don't… I don't know…
translation.zh: 我不知道…

translation.en: what you must think.
translation.zh: 你们会怎么看我

translation.en: All of you.
translation.zh: 你们所有人

translation.en: I understand…
translation.zh: 我可以理解…

translation.en: if you want to recommend…
translation.zh: 就算你建议我…

translation.en: supervision.
translation.zh: （星期一） …找监护

translation.en: [Karl] I'm listening.
translation.zh: 我正听着呢

translation.en: I've been slipping.
translation.zh: 这段时间我很不自觉

translation.en: Slipping on my meds.
translation.zh: 没有按时吃药

translation.en: Drinking.
translation.zh: 还喝酒

translation.en: Getting into a really…
translation.zh: 让自己陷入了非常…

translation.en: dark frame of mind and I'm not sharing that with you.
translation.zh: 阴郁的情绪 并且没有告诉你

translation.en: [Karl] That's a hard thing to admit.
translation.zh: 这确实难以开口

translation.en: And to hear.
translation.zh: 能听你说也很好

translation.en: I don't think that the Elevan is good for me. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 我觉得服用药物对我并不好

translation.en: -[laughs] No. -Not if you're hallucinating, no.
translation.zh: -不好-你都出现幻觉了 不行

translation.en: I wouldn't think, no, no. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 我也觉得…不行

translation.en: And there's some mania… too.
translation.zh: 还让我有些躁狂

translation.en: I just really needed to be at the center of something.
translation.zh: 我只是太需要得到关注

translation.en: I needed a wake-up call.
translation.zh: 我需要有个人让我清醒

translation.en: You got very lucky with that detective.
translation.zh: 幸好你遇到的是那个警探

translation.en: You realize how this could've gone differently.
translation.zh: 你要知道 要不是他情况会大不相同

translation.en: I just wanna turn it around.
translation.zh: 我想弥补这件事

translation.en: I had no idea about David.
translation.zh: 我对戴维一无所知

translation.en: Well, that was a mess.
translation.zh: -那家伙也一团糟-他在吗？

translation.en: -Is he here? -No, no.
translation.zh: -那家伙也一团糟-他在吗？ 不 他…今天下午会过来…

translation.en: He's… gonna come back this afternoon and…
translation.zh: 不 他…今天下午会过来…

translation.en: pick up the last of his stuff.
translation.zh: 把他剩下的东西都带走

translation.en: Which leaves you here alone.
translation.zh: 于是你又只剩下一个人

translation.en: You don't think it's paranoid if I wanna change the locks, do you?
translation.zh: 如果我想把锁都换掉你不会觉得我疑神疑鬼吧？

translation.en: There's gonna have to be somebody here.
translation.zh: 必须得再找个人来

translation.en: And then you and I are gonna go back to three sessions a week.
translation.zh: 接下来我们要恢复每周三次治疗

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I'm Anna Fox.
translation.zh: 我是安娜福克斯

translation.en: Uh, today is, um…
translation.zh: 今天是…

translation.en: Monday. November 6th.
translation.zh: 星期一 11月6号…

translation.en: And I'm making this video…
translation.zh: 我录下这段视频…

translation.en: [whispers] Making…
translation.zh: 录下…

translation.en: I'm Anna Fox, and I'm at 104…
translation.zh: 我是安娜福克斯 我住在纽约曼哈顿121街西区104号

translation.en: West 121st Street in Manhattan, New York.
translation.zh: 我住在纽约曼哈顿121街西区104号

translation.en: And I am, uh, making this video…
translation.zh: 我录下这段视频

translation.en: as my final will and testament.
translation.zh: 作为我的遗嘱

translation.en: Randy Turo, that's a lawyer.
translation.zh: 兰迪图罗是一名律师

translation.en: He has a written will…
translation.zh: 他那儿有一份书面遗嘱

translation.en: that Ed and I did together.
translation.zh: 是我和艾德一同立下的…

translation.en: After, um… Olivia was born.
translation.zh: 就在…奥莉维亚出生之后

translation.en: And I'm not gonna be… making any, like, super-significant changes…
translation.zh: 现在我并不打算对遗嘱做很大的改动…

translation.en: Super… Super…
translation.zh: 很…

translation.en: -Fuck, really? -[camera beeps]
translation.zh: 可恶 真的吗？

translation.en: The point of me doing this is that there's no, um…
translation.zh: 我这么做的目的是为了避免…

translation.en: confusion…
translation.zh: 有人质疑…

translation.en: about, um, my soundness of mind.
translation.zh: 我的思维是否正常

translation.en: My state of mind.
translation.zh: 我的精神状态

translation.en: I-- I-- I especially wanna make sure that, um…
translation.zh: 我尤其要声明的是…

translation.en: that you know that David Winters has absolutely nothing to do with my death.
translation.zh: 戴维温特斯与我的死毫无关系

translation.en: In fact, I'm waiting for him to come…
translation.zh: 其实 我正等着他…

translation.en: to come and to get his stuff…
translation.zh: 回来收拾自己的东西

translation.en: so that I can, um…
translation.zh: 然后我就可以…

translation.en: go through with it.
translation.zh: 实施我的计划

translation.en: Go through with it… [scoffs]
translation.zh: 实施我的计划

translation.en: I just wish I could be forgiven.
translation.zh: 我只希望能获得原谅

translation.en: I really… wish I could just be forgiven.
translation.zh: 我真心希望能获得原谅

translation.en: I want to go back.
translation.zh: 我想回到过去

translation.en: I want to do it over.
translation.zh: 我想重新来过

translation.en: I want to do it different.
translation.zh: 我想做不一样的选择

translation.en: And I can't.
translation.zh: 但是我不能

translation.en: And I can't.
translation.zh: 我不能

translation.en: [shouts] I can't!
translation.zh: 我不能！

translation.en: -[Anna] Punch. -[camera clicks]
translation.zh: 小拳头！

translation.en: -Punch. Punch. -[camera clicking]
translation.zh: 小拳头！ 小拳头！

translation.en: [whispering] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 谁啊？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 是谁？

translation.en: [David] Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉！我打过电话

translation.en: Tried to call. I just need to get my umbrella and my gloves.
translation.zh: 抱歉！我打过电话 我是来拿雨伞和手套的

translation.en: [Anna] Can you come up? Uh, just for a moment.
translation.zh: 你能上来一会儿吗？

translation.en: [David] I'm soaking wet.
translation.zh: 不行 我全身都淋湿了

translation.en: I had a long day and it's not about to end soon.
translation.zh: 我今天倒霉透了 没完没了的麻烦

translation.en: [Anna] Please. It'll just take a minute.
translation.zh: 拜托了 就耽误你一分钟

translation.en: Thank you. For what?
translation.zh: -谢谢你-谢我什么？

translation.en: I wanna show you… a picture.
translation.zh: 我想给你看一张照片

translation.en: The face in the wine glass.
translation.zh: 酒杯上映出的脸

translation.en: Yeah, I see it.
translation.zh: 对 我看到了

translation.en: That is the woman that I saw murdered.
translation.zh: 那就是我看到被害的女人

translation.en: She said that her name was Jane Russell!
translation.zh: 她说她叫简拉塞尔

translation.en: Her name is Katie.
translation.zh: 她的名字叫凯蒂

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Ethan, the son…
translation.zh: 伊森 那孩子

translation.en: she is the birth mother.
translation.zh: 凯蒂才是他的亲生母亲

translation.en: You spent the night with her.
translation.zh: 你和她睡了一晚

translation.en: Wednesday. One night.
translation.zh: 星期三 就一晚

translation.en: She was a total disaster. Why do you think I bailed?
translation.zh: 她是个大麻烦你以为我在逃避什么？

translation.en: I spent the night on a couch in Astoria on Thursday night
translation.zh: 星期四我跑去阿斯托利亚在沙发上睡了一晚

translation.en: just so I don't have to run into her again.
translation.zh: 就是为了避免再次碰到她

translation.en: She ran away on him when she was eight months pregnant.
translation.zh: 她怀孕八个月时离开了他 音信全无

translation.en: Disappeared. Alistair spent two years chasing her down
translation.zh: 阿利斯泰尔花了两年时间到处找她

translation.en: and found her in some Oregon meth commune. He took the boy, she went to prison.
translation.zh: 最后在俄勒冈发现她跟着一伙人吸毒他带走了孩子 她进了监狱

translation.en: -See how I changed the subject on you? -I did.
translation.zh: -看到没？我也成功转换了话题-发现了

translation.en: You don't know who you're fooling with. [laughing]
translation.zh: 你可不知道你是在和谁玩儿呢

translation.en: They told you this?
translation.zh: -这是他们告诉你的？-是她说的

translation.en: She did. She wouldn't shut up.
translation.zh: -这是他们告诉你的？-是她说的 她一开口就说个不停

translation.en: They've been hiding from her for years. She found out they were living in Boston.
translation.zh: 拉塞尔一家躲了她好多年了 她发现他们搬到了波士顿他一直给她钱 让她走

translation.en: He's been paying her to stay away.
translation.zh: 她发现他们搬到了波士顿他一直给她钱 让她走

translation.en: Why did she tell me her name is Jane Russell?
translation.zh: 那她为什么说自己是简拉塞尔？

translation.en: You're Jane Russell. You're Jane Russell.
translation.zh: 你是简拉塞尔吧？

translation.en: What makes you say that?
translation.zh: 你为什么觉得我是？

translation.en: [Anna] Your son came by. Ethan.
translation.zh: 你儿子来过 伊森

translation.en: I saw her murdered.
translation.zh: 我看到她被人杀了

translation.en: Whatever you say, Anna.
translation.zh: 随你怎么说 安娜

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I showed you… the picture.
translation.zh: 我给你看了这张照片

translation.en: Yeah, looking very much alive.
translation.zh: 是的 看着相当真切

translation.en: She's real!
translation.zh: 她真的存在

translation.en: And I need you to go to the police with me.
translation.zh: 我要你和我一起去警察局

translation.en: No. No, no.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: David! You can't just run away from this!
translation.zh: 戴维 你不能对这件事不管不顾

translation.en: [David] Watch me. Oh, shit! Please, David!
translation.zh: -我就不管了-见鬼 求你了 戴维

translation.en: -[glass shatters] -Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 完了

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: You know what's so great about this?
translation.zh: 知道现在最妙的是什么吗？

translation.en: Everyone thinks I'm in New Hampshire right now.
translation.zh: 就是大家都以为我去了新罕布什尔

translation.en: They call it a wilderness program but it's really a prison.
translation.zh: 他们说的荒野训练营其实就是把你关起来

translation.en: I was supposed to go last month but they had a fire or something. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 我本来上个月就要去的但是好像发生了火灾什么的

translation.en: We never had a chance to say goodbye.
translation.zh: 我们永远来不及说再见

translation.en: David!
translation.zh: 戴维？

translation.en: The trick is to run away before you get there.
translation.zh: 关键就是要在到达目的地之前逃走

translation.en: What did you do? [loudly] David!
translation.zh: 你干了什么？戴维！

translation.en: He's dead. You killed him.
translation.zh: 他死了 是你杀了他

translation.en: -No. What? -It's your knife.
translation.zh: 不 什么？ 这是你的刀 在你家里这里只有你们俩

translation.en: Your house. Just the two of you.
translation.zh: 这是你的刀 在你家里这里只有你们俩

translation.en: What did you do? He deserved it.
translation.zh: -你干了什么？-他该死

translation.en: He slept with my mom and got her all pissed off. And then threw her out.
translation.zh: 他睡了我妈妈 还惹她生气最后又把她赶出去

translation.en: She might have just gone away if he'd left her alone.
translation.zh: 他要是没招惹我妈我妈可能早就离开了

translation.en: Then maybe none of this would have happened.
translation.zh: 这一切可能就不会发生了

translation.en: -Don't scream, Anna. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 不要叫喊 安娜

translation.en: That'll just be bad for everyone.
translation.zh: 那样对谁都不好

translation.en: Take a deep breath.
translation.zh: 深呼吸

translation.en: That's what they're always telling me to do.
translation.zh: 大人们总告诉我这样做

translation.en: Self-management coping skills.
translation.zh: 自我管理的能力

translation.en: Good. We can breathe together.
translation.zh: 很好 我们可以一起深呼吸

translation.en: -Why are you so freaked out? -[shuddering]
translation.zh: 你为什么吓成这样？

translation.en: You're killing yourself anyway, right?
translation.zh: 你本就打算自杀的 不是吗？

translation.en: No. No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I thought it was a really nice video.
translation.zh: 我觉得那段视频录得很棒

translation.en: How did you get into my house?
translation.zh: 你怎么进到我家来的？

translation.en: 'Cause you're so vigilant about your keys.
translation.zh: 因为你从不乱放钥匙

translation.en: And sober. Right.
translation.zh: 脑子也清醒！对

translation.en: I've been in here all week.
translation.zh: 我在你家待了一周了

translation.en: You killed your mother.
translation.zh: 你杀了你的妈妈

translation.en: That bothers you, right?
translation.zh: 你觉得无法理解 是吗？

translation.en: You feel for her?
translation.zh: 你同情她吗？

translation.en: You and Katie… one job to do.
translation.zh: 你和凯蒂 就一个任务

translation.en: One fucking thing.
translation.zh: 就那么一件事

translation.en: Take care of your family, right?
translation.zh: 照顾好全家 不是吗？

translation.en: Both of you.
translation.zh: 你们两个一样

translation.en: And what do you do?
translation.zh: 可你做了什么？

translation.en: The real estate lady who sold my dad the house,
translation.zh: 卖房子给我爸的中介

translation.en: she talked about you and what happened.
translation.zh: 跟我们说起过你和你经历的事情

translation.en: And I couldn't stop thinking what a perfect next person you were for me.
translation.zh: 我就忍不住想你多么适合做我的下一个目标

translation.en: I knew exactly what you would like.
translation.zh: 你的喜好我一清二楚

translation.en: Is that a talent or a skill… to know that…
translation.zh: 这算是天赋吗？还是技能？

translation.en: in your professional opinion?
translation.zh: 给点专业的意见呗

translation.en: Okay, see? Now you don't like me anymore.
